report.title: Locations with geometry for location type
report.description: List of locations (with geometry) for a given location type whose parent matches the given parent id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id JOIN termlists_terms tt ON tt.id = l.location_type_id JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id #joins# WHERE 1=1 #filters# AND #website_filter# AND l.deleted = false AND lw.deleted = false AND tt.deleted = false AND t.deleted = false

param.name: parent_id
param.join: JOIN locations lp on st_intersects(lp.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom) and lp.id=#parent_id#

column.name: graphic
column.sql: case when st_astext(l.boundary_geom) is not null then 'circle' else 'cross' end
